work.name: NeuroLeap Corp.
work.summary: Focused on backend web development, working with technologies such as Golang for server-side logic and Vue.js for front-end interactions. Collaborated on specification and advice regarding software engineering implementations for embedded systems and equipment.

work.name: UCI School of Medicine
work.summary: Contributed to the development of the Android version of a CNN-based app which identifies commonly used eyedrop medicine. Utilized our machine-learning model to output and display the epxiration date of medicine bottles varying in format.

work.name: De Anza CompTechS
work.summary: Worked with a small team to repair computers and offer them to students in need. Repaired and tested Windows 10, requisite drivers, and software for academic use.
